casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Wayne SMITH 50P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017

Robert Wayne Smith, For Smith, Robert Wayne.

Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of February 2017 by Defendant to the Denial of Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

Hudson, J. and Ervin, J. recused
